title: Nilaveli land for sale on main road and lagoon
details:
11+ acres of land located on Pulmoddai road (main road through Nilaveli). Access to Nilaveli Beach straight across the road (beach and Pigeon Island about 1km away). Situated about a 20 minute drive from Trincomalee town and just south of Nilaveli Beach and Annilana Hotels and north of Nilaveli town and hospital.

Currently bare land used for cultivation and coconuts however would be ideal guesthouse bungalows with sunset overlooking lagoon. Clear deed and survey plan.
Please send email for more information.
